faqs.question: Are your cookies really healthy?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our cookies are made with 100% natural ingredients - whole wheat flour, pure jaggery, desi ghee, and natural spices. They contain no refined sugar, no maida, and no artificial preservatives.

faqs.question: How long do the cookies stay fresh?
faqs.answer: Our cookies stay fresh for up to 3 months when stored in a cool, dry place. We recommend consuming them within 2 weeks of opening for the best taste and texture.

faqs.question: Do you use any artificial preservatives?
faqs.answer: No, we don't use any artificial preservatives. Our cookies are made fresh and stay fresh naturally due to the quality of ingredients and traditional preparation methods.

faqs.question: Are your cookies suitable for diabetics?
faqs.answer: While jaggery has a lower glycemic index than white sugar, our cookies still contain natural sugars. We recommend consulting with your healthcare provider before consuming if you have diabetes.

faqs.question: Do you offer bulk orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer bulk orders for special occasions and corporate gifting. Please contact us via WhatsApp for custom pricing and delivery arrangements.

faqs.question: What is your delivery policy?
faqs.answer: We deliver across India. Delivery charges and timelines vary by location. We use eco-friendly packaging and ensure your cookies reach you fresh and intact.

faqs.question: Can I customize the ingredients?
faqs.answer: Currently, we offer our signature recipe. However, we're working on introducing variations. Follow us on social media for updates on new flavors and custom options.

faqs.question: How do I place an order?
faqs.answer: You can place an order by clicking the 'Order on WhatsApp' button on our website or app. Simply send us a message with your requirements and we'll guide you through the process.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept UPI, net banking, and digital wallets. Payment is collected at the time of delivery to ensure a smooth transaction process.

faqs.question: Do you have a return policy?
faqs.answer: We stand by the quality of our products. If you're not satisfied with your order, please contact us within 24 hours of delivery and we'll make it right.
